section.title: Provisioning Request Approval Methods
section.para: In this chapter, you will learn about the different approval methods. The request can be approved manually in the CloudForms Management Engine console, set for automatic approval by setting options in the Automate Explorer, or by using an external method.

When using an external method, the approval actually takes place on the external system and is sent directly for execution. This chapter discusses how to view and edit requests in the CloudForms Management Engine Console, how to approve a request, and how to set automatic approval parameters.
